title: Sales of streaming devices in the United States 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 6 number of Streaming Brands.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 8.8 is found at Streaming Brand Apple TV and the minimum is found at Tivo where Streaming Brand is 1.2.
There is a difference of 7.6 between the maximum Streaming Brand Apple TV and minimum Streaming Brand Tivo.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Streaming Brand, and Unit sales in millions in each Streaming Brand on the y axis.
The Unit sales in millions is appeared to be the highest at Streaming Brand Apple TV and lowest at Streaming Brand Tivo.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 6 number of Streaming Brands.
The maximum Unit sales in millions 8.8 is found at Streaming Brand Apple TV and the minimum is found at Tivo where Streaming Brand is 1.2.
There is a difference of 7.6 between the maximum Streaming Brand Apple TV and minimum Streaming Brand Tivo.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit sales in millions for 6 number of Streaming Brands.
Streaming Brand Apple TV has the highest Unit sales in millions and Tivo has the lowest Unit sales in millions.
Streaming Brand Fire TV has the second highest value for Unit sales in millions.
The highest Streaming Brand Apple TV has 7.6 more Unit sales in millions than the lowest Streaming Brand Tivo.
Streaming Brand Apple TV is higher than any other Streaming Brands with value 8.8, followed by Fire TV, and Roku. Down to Streaming Brand Tivo with the lowest value 1.2.
The average Unit sales in millions in all 6 Streaming Brands is 4.6.
Summing up the values of all Streaming Brands, we get total 27.6.
